frame.name: Sound_level
frame.definition: <def-root>An <fen>Entity</fen> is judged by a sound <fen>Attribute</fen> of some perceived level of <fen>Volume</fen> intensity. <ex><fex name="Entity">The radio</fex> is <fex name="Degree">very</fex> <t>loud</t>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Entity
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Entity</fen> for which the sound level <fen>Attribute</fen> is under consideration.</def-root>

FE.name: Attribute
FE.definition: <def-root>The feature of an <fen>Entity</fen> which is under consideration. This FE is incorporated in each LU in the frame.</def-root>

FE.name: Volume
FE.definition: <def-root>A quantity or characterization of the <fen>Entity</fen>'s sound output with repspect to its <fen>Attribute</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition: <def-root>A modifier expressing the deviation of the <fen>Volume</fen> from the norm. </def-root>

FE.name: Circumstances
FE.definition: <def-root>Some specification of the circumstances under which the <fen>Entity</fen> has a particular <fen>Volume</fen> for the <fen>Attribute</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Time</fen> during which the <fen>Entity</fen> is in the state of having a particular <fen>Volume</fen> for the <fen>Attribute</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Explanation
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Explanation</fen> denotes a proposition from which the main clause (headed by the target) logically follows.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: loud.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: an acoustic output percieved as being a high volume

lexUnit.name: quiet.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: an acoustic output percieved as being a low volume
